title: CUBI Cardano Universal Basic Income
description: There does not exist a universal or partial basic income system built on the Cardano blockchain for individuals in need of financial help.
solution: The CUBI system will pay users with the ROI from the delegation of ADA to stake pools operated by the CUBI program into DID smart wallets.
experience: I am a fund 4 and fund 5 winner, astrophysicist, dApp developer, and community contributor. Please check out my site www.logicalmechanism.io
